fields_of_interest: Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
eu_initiatives: EUPAVE's mission is to advocate and enable wider use of cement and concrete applications in European transport infrastructure by engaging with EU, national and local decision makers, by disseminating technical know-how and communicating benefits and by promoting innovation and best practices in the sector.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: EUPAVE is active in communicating decision makers as well as public through its newsletter, website, workshops, seminars and dedicated events.
